examples.en: I waited a good hour.
He left after an hour.
I may be an hour.
The hour invites.
Your hour has struck.
Her mood changes every hour.
It hailed for an hour.
You're half an hour late.
I'll be back in three hours.
It saves you one hour.
examples.ru: Ты экономишь на этом час времени.

examples.en: The hour of sunset was near.
I spoke to him only an hour ago.
examples.ru: Я говорил с ним всего час назад.

examples.en: We're paid by the hour.
She was half an hour late.
He had spoken towards an hour.
We live an hour from the airport.
examples.ru: Мы живём в часе езды от аэропорта.

examples.en: Rain held up play for an hour.
We'll be back inside the hour.
The rent was only $20 an hour.
examples.ru: Арендная плата составляла всего двадцать долларов в час.

examples.en: Trains depart every half hour.
They arrived a few hours later.
examples.ru: Они приехали на несколько часов позже.

examples.en: Rest your men for an hour.
Keep that hour open for me.
examples.ru: Оставь, пожалуйста, этот час для нашей встречи (нашего разговора).

examples.en: Set the clocks back an hour.
I've only had an hour's kip.
Every hour a train goes past.
I waited a half hour in line.
Three hours later he was back.
Jim blew in about an hour ago.
examples.ru: Джим заявился сюда около часа назад.

examples.en: An inch of rain fell in an hour.
examples.ru: В течении часа выпал дюйм дождя /дождевых осадков/.
